  • Package hirondelle.stocks.help

    • Class AboutAction extends AbstractAction implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • fFrame

          JFrame fFrame

        • fObjectHeapSize

          JLabel fObjectHeapSize
          Displays the size of the object heap. In a typical GUI application, the breakdown for memory consumption is roughly
          • classes - 70%
          • objects - 15%
          • other - 15%
          There is no API for displaying total memory use. The memory consumed by objects, however, is available, and is displayed by this label; the display is updated periodically.

        • fTimer

          Timer fTimer
          Periodically updates the display of fObjectHeapSize.

        • fHeapSizeUpdater

          ActionListener fHeapSizeUpdater

        • fHelpBroker

          HelpBroker fHelpBroker

        • fDisplayHelp

          CSH.DisplayHelpFromSource fDisplayHelp

  • Package hirondelle.stocks.portfolio

    • Class EditPortfolioAction extends AbstractAction implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • fCurrentPortfolio

          CurrentPortfolio fCurrentPortfolio
          The current portfolio, whose contents are to be edited. It is important to note that this field is updated only if the user selects OK and if fWorkingCopy does not equal fCurrentPortfolio. All individual edits made by the user are performed on fWorkingCopy. This allows the user to easily back out of any edits they have performed.

        • fWorkingCopy

          Set<E> fWorkingCopy
          Contains the Stock objects being edited.

          Initially contains all items in fCurrentPortfolio; all edits performed by the user will be initially applied only to fWorkingCopy. If the user ultimately chooses OK, then the objects in fCurrentPortfolio are made to match the items in fWorkingCopy.

          Created once upon construction, and emptied and reused each time actionPerformed is called.

        • fStockSelector

          JList<E> fStockSelector
          Allows the user to select one of the stocks in their portfolio.

        • fModel

          EditPortfolioAction.Model fModel
          Underlies fStockSelector.

        • fFrame

          JFrame fFrame
          Parent window to which the dialog is attached.

  • Package hirondelle.stocks.preferences

    • Class EditUserPreferencesAction extends AbstractAction implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • fFrame

          JFrame fFrame

        • fPrefEditors

          List<E> fPrefEditors

        • fEditor

          EditUserPreferencesAction.Editor fEditor
          Specifying this as a field allows for "lazy" creation and use of the GUI, which is of particular importance for a preferences dialog, since they are usually heavyweight, and have a large number of components.

  • Package hirondelle.stocks.quotes

    • Class FetchQuotesAction extends AbstractAction implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • fCurrentPortfolio

          CurrentPortfolio fCurrentPortfolio
          The set of Stock objects in which the user is currently interested.

        • fQuoteTablePrefEditor

          QuoteTablePreferencesEditor fQuoteTablePrefEditor
          Edits user preferences attached to a table which presents quote data, and allows read-only programmatic access to such preferences.

        • fQuoteTable

          QuoteTable fQuoteTable
          GUI element which is updated whenever a new set of quotes is obtained.

        • fSummaryView

          SummaryView fSummaryView
          GUI element which is updated whenever a new set of quotes is obtained.

        • fTimer

          Timer fTimer
          Periodically fetches quote data.

          Use of a Swing Timer is acceptable here, in spite of the fact that the task takes a long time to complete, since the task does not in fact get executed on the event-dispatch thread, but on a separate worker thread.

        • fUpdateFreq

          int fUpdateFreq
          The number of minutes to wait between fetches of quote information.

        • fTickerWarningFormat

          MessageFormat fTickerWarningFormat

    • Class SummaryView extends JPanel implements Serializable
